name: Western Addition Beacon Center
description: Located at John Muir Elementary School, the Western Addition Beacon Center provides programming for youth and adults with a mission to enrich the lives of community members and ensure the healthy development of young people. They offer AM care, lunch-time and afterschool programming, including academic support, college preparation, computer and media technology, cultural arts and events, recreational activities, and referral-based case management.
